author: Staff Reporter
text:
To enhance the cargo growth at Chennai airport, the Airports Authority of India (AAI) has launched an incentive scheme to reduce the operating cost of airlines, according to a press release.

The scheme will decrease the operating cost of airlines when they operate a cargo freighter aircraft. If an airline operates 6-10 freighters a month, it will receive a 10 per cent concession on applicable landing charges on freighters, the release said.
title: AAI’s offer to up cargo growth
